WorkItem.Description:
I used the latest version of svg.dll. The conversion crash in case set both attribute "stroke-dasharray" and style "stroke".
e.g.:
<rect class="extent" style="stroke: #666;" x="283.64550898203595" width="279.9377245508982" y="0" height="123" stroke-dasharray="0,279.9377245508982, 123,279.9377245508982, 123"></rect>

the conversion goes well when removing either one.
WorkItem.Summary: conversion crash when set both attr "stroke-dasharray" and style "stroke"
